projectName: Turks Head Brewing Cellar Expansion Panel
variation: Automated multi-zone fermentation control expansion with 32 relay-controlled glycol valves, VPN access, and full data logging

parts.description: Solenoid or actuator controlled via 24VDC relays
Remote access and control via iPad or browser
Continuous lifecycle tracking, email + SMS alerts

notes: This panel expands the main fermentation control system with a 32-zone relay-driven output array. Full schematic and PLC relay assignments are provided. CAD shows segmented relay banks and power distribution. Includes remote diagnostics, tank scheduling, and alarm notifications.
